name: Entangled Media
overview:
Entangled Media is a software/cloud services startup working to revolutionize the relationship between people, data and devices.

Entangled Media’s core technology, called younity, is designed to be a ubiquitous data platform that enables data to exist in multiple places, either physically or virtually, simultaneously, hence the company name is derived from the concept of quantum entanglement.

younity works as a protocol to transparently integrate into the device operating system, making it inherently multi-device aware - anything done on one devices is done on all devices. They can never be different from one another.

younity is also able to integrate online services directly into the device OS to simplify and streamline access to one’s files- whether locally on a device or online- in one single, familiar place.

By virtualizing data, younity maintains a single, common view of all a user’s files, even if the device does not have enough storage for them. Simply open a file like it was stored locally, and it is streamed on-demand.

younity aims to deliver on the promise of “context-based device usage” - where a user never thinks about what device to use based on any consideration of data. Simply grab any device that is convenient and never think about it.

They have offices in Los Angeles and Boulder.
